reporter_caption.center: FIDELITY UNION TRUST CO. v. STRIDSBERG, 129 N.J. Eq. 386 (1941)

caption.center: FIDELITY UNION TRUST COMPANY, trustee, et al. respondents, v. EDITH V.F.
STRIDSBERG et al., guardians ad litem, appellants.

opinion.posture: On appeal from a decree of the Court of Chancery.
opinion.attorneys:
Messrs. Hood, Lafferty Campbell, Mr. Roger Hinds, Messrs.Whiting Moore and Mr. David A. McBride, for the respondents.
Messrs. Pitney, Hardin Skinner, for the appellants.
opinion.opinion_text:
The decree appealed from will be affirmed, for the reasons stated in the opinion filed in the court below by Vice-Chancellor Stein, and reported at 127 N.J. Eq. 346, sub nom. Fidelity UnionTrust Co. v. Farley. For affirmance — PARKER, BODINE, DONGES, HEHER, PERSKIE, PORTER, DEAR, WELLS, WOLFSKEIL, RAFFERTY, HAGUE, THOMPSON, JJ. 12.
For reversal — THE CHIEF-JUSTICE, CASE, COLIE, JJ. 3.Page 387
